DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct investigate potential reaction losartan hydrochlorothiazide .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old 45 healthy male volunteer Who pass screen parameter A clinically significant abnormal physical exam , medical history , laboratory study If show sit SBP > 140 < 100 mmHg , DBP > 90 < 60mm Hg , pulse rate > 95 < 50 beats/min screen The use prescription drug within previous month use overthecounter medication within past 14 day A history blood dyscrasias A history alcohol drug abuse within past year Donation blood 8 week prior study plan donate blood within 8 week complete study Unable tolerate vein puncture multiple blood sampling Any surgical/medical condition might alter drug absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion
